posts.post_content:
I READ AN OLD THREAD ABOUT CYCLE 460 BACKS YESTERDAY. THE AUTHOR STATED HE HAD NOT SEEN A CY SEYMOUR THROWING. WELL LAST NIGHT I WAS FILTERING SOME THINGS AND I FOUND ONE. JUST THOUGHT I'D PUT THIS OUT.

[IMG]http://i298.photobucket.com/albums/mm269/lharri3600/SEYMOURCYCLE460.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks Larry,  That is actually the 3rd one I have seen in the last few months.  All the sudden they seem to be showing up.  I was able to purchase one.

Once again, Thanks for the heads up.  The list is down to 5.

Lee

Congrats, Lee!  glad to see that you are getting so close!


best,
barry
Hi Lee - not sure if you saw this one recently as well, but Leifield (btg) exists.

Yes, I did see the card.  I thought I had bid strong but no luck.  The list is down to 5:

Chance Batting
McQuillan, Batting
Schaefer, Follow Thru
Seymour, Portrait
Wilhelm, Batting

Lee
